title: Astronomical Units Conversion
description:
ASTRO converts various distance units commonly used in 
astronomy. Normally, only the input to be converted is occupied and the 
remaining inputs remain free. However, if several inputs loaded with 
values, the values of all inputs are converted accordingly and then 
summed.
1 AE = 149,597870 * 109 m
1 PC = 206265 AE
1 LJ = 9,460530 * 1015 m = 63240 AE = 0,30659 PC
name: ASTRO

input.name: AE
input.description: Distance in astronomical units, where 1 AE = 149,597,870 meters.

input.name: PC
input.description: Distance in parsecs, where 1 parsec = 206265 AE.

input.name: LJ
input.description: Distance in light years, where 1 light year = 63240 AE.

output.name: Ym
output.description: Converted distance in meters based on input parameters.
